## Checklist

- [ ] I synced from latest main and read `.local/INDEX.md`
- [ ] I understand the sync workflow (see CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] I updated the `.local` submodule pointer for this PR
- [ ] I added a worklog entry in `.local/worklog/<name>.md` (datetime+tz+commit range)
- [ ] If this is my first PR: I added `.local/ack/<name>.md`
